record.title: ELECTION OF MEMBER TO COMMITTEE ON THE BUDGET

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, by direction of the Democratic Caucus, I offer a privileged resolution (H. Res. 253) and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Hampshire?

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I object. I ask the Clerk to read the resolution.
